title: Sleeping
content:
Rolls from within 1.5 of sleeping creatures have Advantage, and any attack that hits the creature is a Critical Hit. Condition is removed by taking damage, receiving Help or being Shoved.

How to Acquire Sleeping

Sleep Drow Poison Eyebite: Asleep Glyph of Warding: Sleep Potion of Sleep ???

How to Remove Sleeping

Taking damage, receiving Help or being Shoved.
